ComicInfo.Title: Drawn & Quarter Box
ComicInfo.Summary:
Cartooning legend Batton Lash and Archie Comics artist Bill Galvin deliver an awesome Pink Panther adventure as The Inspector gives chase through a comic book bargain bin in "Drawn and Quarterbox." Pink is fresh off his Free Comic Book Day debut and introducing fans young and old to his timeless hijinks! If you love classic animation it doesn't get any better than this. New modern stories and classic tales come together to deliver an experience perfect for everyone in the family! You'll laugh along with Pink as he drives The Little Man and The Inspector crazy with his cool pinkitude. And our comics are jam-packed with goodies that deliver more pink for your green! Join the cool cat for unforgettable adventures and sidesplitting laughs in The Pink Panther comics!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Adrian Ropp | 1 | Var | Pink Hijinks Variant Cover | S.L. Gallant | 2 | Var | Classic Variant Cover | S.L. Gallant | 3 | RI | 1:3 Retro Retailer Incentive Cover | Animation Art | 4 | 1) The Pink Panther - Drawn & Quarter Box - feat. Inspector - 7 pages
2) Classic Inspector - Case of the Crime Inc. Caper - 5 pages (reprint from The Pink Panther #52)
3) The Pink Panther - Pink In The Machine - 10 pages
4) Classic Pink Panther - Pink Palm - 5 pages (reprint from The Pink Panther #52)
S.L. Gallant Sketchbook - 4 pages
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-05 20:37:10. [CVDB539290]

ComicInfo.Penciller: Bill Galvan, Jacob Greenawalt, Pete Alvarado, S.L. Gallant, Warren Tufts, Bill Galvan, Jacob Greenawalt, Pete Alvarado, S.L. Gallant, Warren Tufts
ComicInfo.Inker: Bob Smith, Jacob Greenawalt, Pete Alvarado, Warren Tufts, Jacob Greenawalt, Pete Alvarado, Warren Tufts
ComicInfo.Characters: Inspector, Little Man, Pink Panther, The Aardvark, The Ant, The Commissioner
